comments:
I've had this happen a couple of times. I start the workbench, and three 
editors are properly restored (they were open when I exited). When I double-
click a class in the package explorer, for which an editor is open, I get the 
following in the log. Similarly for my attempts to simply click on the editor 
tab for the bogus editor to close it.

I20030129, JDK 1.4.1
